website_summaries.verdict: This silicone brush offers a unique concept and does an acceptable job cleaning delicate materials, but it isn't up for heavy-duty tasks.
pros: Made entirely of silicone, so it's safe to use on surfaces that scratch easily
12.5-inch length makes it practical for cleaning tall bottles
Also fits easily into narrow openings
Material is BPA-free and dishwasher safe
cons: Brush top is somewhat small and difficult to use for cleaning items like large jars
Not good for scrubbing tough food buildup

customer_reviews.title: Small Brush
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I’ll get used to the feeling of not really seeing bubbles. I’m so used to the sponge. I attached a picture and a video. Update: After using this silicone brush for three months, I can say that I did got used to it. It does get bottles clean and I love that it reaches through those tall bottles like Dr. Brown. There is a TIP though, you got to put some extra water to the bottle while cleaning it so it can make some bubbles. That gives me the feeling that it is cleaning well. And the brush still looks line new even though I use it everyday. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: wendali albarran

customer_reviews.title: Fits in breast pump flanges
customer_reviews.text: Fits into the flanges for my breast pump and no bacteria growing like in traditional bottle brushes, going to order some silicone sponges for regular dishwashing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Replaced My Nasty Sponge Tipped Bottle Brush
customer_reviews.text: I use bike bottles, tumblers, Klean Kanteens on a daily basis. My old, sponge-tipped brush just didn't do the job and was nasty! Happened to see this nifty silicone brush and decided to give it a try. The cleaning part looks small but is surprisingly powerful. The stiff bristles really do a good job scouring any gunk away. The brush seems to just rinse clean! So happy I got this!
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Effective, functional and colorful.  Great bottle brush
customer_reviews.text: I love that nothing sticks or stains the brush because it's silicone. I use it on my glassware and decanters and there are no scratches! Works great for cleaning out my hydro flask too. I plan to order several more for Christmas stocking stuffers. Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Well, I got the brush...
customer_reviews.text: So I did indeed get the Silicone brush, and the handle length is correct - but the actual brush part of it is small. Really small. I ordered it to help clean sports bottles that have a screw off lid, and are a bit too narrow to fit my hand in for cleaning. This silicone "brush" part on the handle is 1 inch wide and 2 inches long. ONE INCH WIDE...... so if you are expecting a wider brush at the end of the handle, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Used the brush to clean my reusable water bottle and it did a much better job than any other sponge/brush I’ve ever used! It’s super easy to keep clean as well which is nice. The brush was delivered quickly and very nicely packaged!
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Reach
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me & frustrated in the kitchen with those hard to reach spots in bottles glasses & vases this is the ultimate gadget for your kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning head is too small to do larger jars , it also is not worth the price to buy it . . I would not recommend this to any one .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Denardo Jr

customer_reviews.title: The brush does the job
customer_reviews.text: The brush's bristles are very flexible and great for cleaning long neck water bottles or containers of similar construction.
customer_reviews.author: JMar

customer_reviews.title: I love this cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I bought this because it’s very hard to clean my shakers. This fits perfectly to any of the shakers and cleans very thoroughly. It’s made of silicone so very easy to clean and feels very sturdy and durable. For $12 that’s a great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Kumsal

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice silicon brush for cleaning bottles. Brush head was smaller than I anticipated, but still very effeftive
customer_reviews.author: EdgarAve

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Picture
customer_reviews.text: I just received this brush and am very disappointed. The picture is deceptive because it makes the brush head look at least three inches wide. I’ll keep it, but I won’t be throwing out my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Clean water bottles with ease!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bottle brush. I was looking for something that wasn’t going to be a germ magnet so I like the silicone because it’s easy to keep clean. It works very well for cleaning my klean Kanteens, the brush is small enough to get through the opening and cleans the whole bottle easily. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMadeline

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really feel like it’s ckeaning
customer_reviews.text: Best way to explain it is that it won’t hold soap the material really doesn’t hold suds they fall off so I feel like I’m mostly rubbing the grime off I prefer a sudsy brush
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit in my bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush to be used for my Kombucha bottles. There were a couple small neck bottles shown in the photo for this brush and what it can be used for, so I had high hopes. Once I received this brush, I quickly realized that it will not fit in my skinny neck Ikea Bottles. I’m very disappointed. Hopefully I can find another alternative...
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to friends and would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s: - long neck -small head - good scrubby action without worrying that the bristles are going to fall out or bend - love the bright orange color Con’s: (None that I’ve seen yet.) I love using a silicone scrub brush! It really grabs the junk on the insides of the bottles. I have glass I’ll bottles for when we buy raw milk, and I’ve never been able to get them as clean as I wanted to. Now, they are going to shine! I’ve already used them on other glass jars, and they are finally not going to have a film on them from this awful hard water.
customer_reviews.author: LDS Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller then I had thought it was but it works amazingly Hard rubber so it is easy to clean after using and put away. No need to ever buy another bottle brush as this one will probably outlast me. The end you grip has a comfortable handle that doesn't slip around as I clean the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Angel44fire

customer_reviews.title: Too big for small openings
customer_reviews.text: I’m here to comment on the size only. (I can’t attest to its effectiveness or durability.) I bought this bottle brush to clean a small pet water bottle and it’s too big. Then I tested on a wine bottle and it’s too big for that, as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Read the item description carefully
customer_reviews.text: I must not have been paying close attention. This thing is really truly a BOTTLE brush for narrow-necked bottles. For some reason I thought it was more like the kind of "mop" on a stick that you use for washing things like deep drinking glasses. I might have returned it, but I decided maybe it would be useful for getting out the crud that you can't easily get with a scouring pad. And in truth you CAN wash a glass with it, although it doesn't feel quite right somehow. It is sturdily built and easy to clean and you really can lean in on it.
customer_reviews.author: handyman

customer_reviews.title: A QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS TO CLEAN THE WATER TANK IN MY CUISINART COFFEE MAKER. IT WORKS PERFECTLY. I'M SURE I'LL ALSO FIND OTHER USES FOR THIS NIFTY BRUSH. JUST NEED TO REMEMBER I HAVE IT. IT'S VERY STURDY, BUT ALSO FLEXIBLE. ALL SMALL BRISTLE BRUSHES I RESEARCHED DON'T HAVE BRISTLES ON THE BOTTOM; THIS ONE DOES .
customer_reviews.author: JOAN

customer_reviews.title: It's REALLY Small
customer_reviews.text: We clean several water bottles daily at our house, and I thought this would be a great alternative to our typical bottle brush with nylon bristles. I was surprised to see how small the cleaning head is; while I could fit it in all of my bottles, it didn't do a good job cleaning inside the bottle. The silicon bristles are way too small to really get a good wash on the inside. I returned this because I thought it would be bigger and better based on the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to side
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be much larger. I’m 5’3. I have a tiny hand. Like your average bottle brush cleaner with a longer handle. I laughed when I opened the package. Yeah, sure it’ll clean bottles. But not what I expected. Think I’m going to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I guess the pictures were a little deceiving. I was kind of hoping for a fuller brush head to clean my Blender bottles with but this came out to be super small and just didn’t really work well with anything I used it for. I spent longer on dishes with this brush and I hoped for a better cleaning tool than the normal brush. Would probably be great for The bottles that have smaller mouths at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Jhoanna

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my narrow mouth hydroflask!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my narrow mouthed hydroflask! Nothing else could fit through the opening or get deep enough into the bottle! Texture of the brush is great to help with cleaning. Plus I love the fun color! Definitely a top quality product. I will be buying more as Christmas gifts for my friends! A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bottle Brush Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I thought a nice fluffy bottle brush was the way to go until the splash generated from shoving it through the tiny hole of my Swell bottles grossed me out enough to look for something else. It's counter intuitive but this much smaller, not fluffy, but mightier silicone bottle brush does everything it says it will do...and wont ruin your silk blouse with brush splatter as you try to clean that last item in the kitchen sink before you rush off to work. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: mominMB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to love it, but it doesn’t clean well. Regular bristles are much more effective. Will not buy again. Boohoo.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Helper

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Clean Water Bottles and Coffee Cups
customer_reviews.text: Everyone hates to clean those cups no matter what you carry in them every day and I don't blame them. But this little orange buddy will change your mind - it's super easy to use and it cleans like nobody's business! I was really sceptical when I saw how small it was, but it works. The other cups we have - the 24oz. Yeti's - were stained pretty badly and the lids were in need of serious tactical assault and this thing took care of it with very little effort on my part. To make things even better, it cleans up easily itself on the top rack of the dishwasher and shows no signs of wear or tear so far.
customer_reviews.author: Larshine

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: What even is this for? I bought this after reading everyone’s glowing review. Tried to clean some baby bottles with it and it hardly suds up, requiring a lot more dishwashing liquid, and still, the bottles aren’t completely clean. I hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Tan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT WHEN I NEED IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't always use this bottle brush but I love it when I need it. It's a real pain to try to clean narrow-necked bottle or slim glasses. This product fits the bill. Soap-up the brush end and the bottle and I get very good results. My only lament it that the brush wand could be a little more flexible to make it easier to manipulate the brush around the bottom of the bottle or glass. All-it-ail this is a good thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Too damn tiny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what size bottles i can possibly clean with this itty bitty brush....read the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Nation

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit into small bottles
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this as a bottle brush, BUT it is made more for wider-mouthed items such as water bottles. This will not fit into smaller mouthed bottles such as hummingbird feeders. Also, I contacted customer service and was left unsatisfied. They basically said, yeah, won't fit into smaller mouthed bottles. Would not buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: WOO HOO!  Clean water bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Always had trouble washing my water bottles. I am an ultra runner. Now I have the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks bigger than actual but still works perfectly and fits everything
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush I use it for my gym shaker glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The head of the brush should fit all  dimensions of the top of the bottles .
customer_reviews.text: What I like that it picks up the residue around and at the bottom of the bottle. I do wish it would fit in smaller bottles and perhaps have flexible handle that you could bend in different directions. But it does clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Kitchen cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find a bottle brush that wasn't nylon bristled because they get shabby and out of shape after a few uses. The Kitchiny Silicone brush was perfect except for 2 things; 1) bristles don't condensed enough to fit through the opening of a vinegar cruet and 2) it would be better if it was about an inch longer. I had to return it for these reasons only, otherwise it would have found a permanent home in our arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: BILL POWELL

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My friend has it, I used it to help her with her baby and I was amazed by the quality! I asked her for the link and here I am writing reviews:) Great quality, easy to wash, the brush gets into places you want to clean deep! I gave sturdiness a 4*... but overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Romanica

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: This brush worked wonders to scrub the bottom of my vases and bottles that I could never get clean. Also, the silicone doesn't scratch up the glass which is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Drazen

customer_reviews.title: A Necessity For Any Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have two Hydro Flask bottles, one wide, and standard mouth size. This brush perfectly cleans both. I'd been looking for a bottle brush for sometime, but never made the jump. Hydro Flask sold brushes are incredibly overpriced, so I went looking elsewhere. I ended up buying this as a test trial to see if it worked as well as the reviews say, and I'm happy to say it does. The brush itself is much smaller then I had expected, but works when it comes to cleaning. I thoroughly recommend this for anyone who is needing to clean there water bottle from regular liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush, I use it on my 24 I hydro flask, it works great. I chose it over the hydro flask brand because of the silicone, and I think it’s great! If you have a hydro flask you’d know they can be prone to mold but this brush helps keep mine clean! The only thing I would change is I would like if the scrubber head was a bit bigger. But other than that It’s a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mollis mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have always struggled to get the bottom of glasses or bottles cleaned with a dish rag. I have purchased other bottle cleaners and they always end up falling appart, smelling yucky, binding and causing issues. I love this one thought it is sturdy and the little rubber ends act like little fingers. I have been able to clean the bottom of glasses and bottles with ease and have not had to worry about the yucky smell, broken stem, or bristles falling out. I love my little scrubber!
customer_reviews.author: Bessie

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to clean Swell water bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and find it very easy to use. We have several Swell bottles and it is the perfect solution to be able to get all the way down inside the bottle to do a thorough cleaning. It is very sturdy. However, my husband does not think it is easy to use, so opinions may differ.
customer_reviews.author: K. HOWE

customer_reviews.title: Great silicone dish brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love this silicone brush! I use it to wash the inside of my 24 oz. Ball jars, my coffee cup and my RTIC cup. This will be handy for washing my glass sports bottle. I put a little hot water inside the cup and wet the brush and add 2 drops of dawn then scrub. Then I pour the soapy solution in the next cup and wash and rinse. The brush rinses easily and a few shakes and the brush in nearly dry. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vlaporta

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty small
customer_reviews.text: The head of the brush is much smaller than I expected, but it could be that this is what the producers intended for the product, to be able to fit into smaller spaces. It's also pretty short in length, I barely have a grip on it when I brush my hydro-flask and other large bottles. The brush still works well and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: MrAloha

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: The rod inside this brush is very strong. I can really scrub the inside of my large and small hydroflasks without the brush bending at all. And the brush is effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Nah!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like how this brush cleans. Its a bit awkward to clean with. Also it’s too skinny to clean baby bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for this for so long!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a small brush as other reviewers have commented, but it's SUPER EFFECTIVE at cleaning water bottles. I have 3 hydro flasks all different sizes and this brush 100% does the trick and cleans them very effectively. I wad having a hard time finding a brush that did this effectively and didn't need to be thrown every few months. This is a very sturdy, long life product, and I the small size helps get the base and neck areas very clean. Highly recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: A. Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide scrubbing power to remove coffee residue from bottom of tall insulated mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide enough scrubbing power to remove coffee residue from bottom of tall insulated steel mugs. I tried using this product, using hot water and soap, for about 5 minutes with no success. I then dropped a brillo pad in the mug and used this product to move the brillo pad around. All residue was gone after about 30 seconds of work. This silicon product may protect from scratching glass, but does not suit my need.
customer_reviews.author: P. Toivonen

customer_reviews.title: Stiff as a board
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it’s probably the best brush you will have for items that are at the bottom of water bottles. However it doesnt expand like the pictures Indicate. It does stay strong like a guy on viagra and will clean what you want. I’ve used it to get mold out of sports bottles and calcified lime in coffee pots. This is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A bit stiff and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely say it’s sturdy. A little to stiff in my opinion, and very long. I’m sure it’s a good fit for someone but it wasn’t useful for our need (4 oz baby bottles, the handle was pretty long and it felt awkward with the bottle being in the smaller side). We wanted a bottle brush that seemed more hygienic then ones that have a foam sponge on them. I think this would be a great product if it were a bit more flexible and had a shorter handle.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy M Kelsch

customer_reviews.title: Good Bottle Brush
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but this was not what I was expecting, however, it works just fine. My daughter likes to drink milk and her container kept leaking. I bought her plastic milk bottles and although I would soak them, I just felt like I needed to get in the bottle to clean it. This works great. It is quite small, but fits through the narrow top. I just scrub the sides and it seems to do the trick. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: A Necessity For All
customer_reviews.text: With all the different sized bottles, drinking vessels and other difficult things to keep clean, this brush is a must. I like the size of it and the fact that it is not plastic bristles, which quickly lose their shape and are not strong enough to get out stains. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Martin

customer_reviews.title: Finally a brush that's narrow, sturdy and long enough!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a while to find a bottle brush that will clean my hummingbird feeder. This one is great! It is long enough, the head fits through the narrow neck and the bristles don't break off! All problems I have had with previous brushes. This has made my life so much easier and will help keep the hummers healthy! Quick delivery also.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Banta

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for water bottles....Only.
customer_reviews.text: Good brush for water bottles. Would not use to wash out any bottle that had juice or a smoothie or pretty much anything in it besides water as the brush is very stiff and not the best for scrubbing and getting certain angles. Works decent for getting water bottles clean though and one of the big reasons I bought it was the fact that it is antibacterial. My last water bottle scrub brush from Sigg looked like it had mold growing at the base of the bristles, no matter how much I cleaned it with antibacterial soap. So, I tossed it and got this one. So far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MelleG

customer_reviews.title: Long handle very Very small head.
customer_reviews.text: I love how long and sturdy the handle on this product is: it reaches the bottom of all my bottles. The size of the actual head is a completely different story. The total diameter is just over an inch. Makes it extremely difficult to scrub all the surfaces. I feel like I’m using a very long qtip to wash my bottles and feel it takes way longer than it should.
customer_reviews.author: M G S

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning easy
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning vases is now much easier for me, this brush just slips right in and gets the job done! No more worries about getting my hand stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Y.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is small but with a very long handle. I use it for a variety of purposes, but it is the perfect size for cleaning baby bottles. I especially like how it doesn't stain or show wear and tear unlike typical brushes that become discolored.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Bottle brush
customer_reviews.text: I rated it the way I did because I have not used it yet but you seem to need a review right away. I do not use bottle brushes every day. But when I need one, I need one that works well. I will know how good it is the next time I need it. That said, it seems to be exactly what I’m looking for, sturdy and easy to clean and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Not only can I easily clean out my water bottles but it also helps clean my silicon baking items! It gets into the little creases and is able to scrape out the excess food. Love that I can also disinfect it!
customer_reviews.author: InsaneNurse

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Used this the first time to clean my hummingbird feeder which has been obnoxious to clean. It went in easily and got everywhere! Really felt it had finally done the job and quickly, too. My hummers are mean and want their food now! Really like silicon, it seems to last longer and hold its shape well. Can highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's tiny
customer_reviews.text: make sure you check out the photos before ordering this because it is super tiny. i like that it's silicon and easy to rinse off and get food out of it. but i didn't need a brush this small and it's sort of annoying to use because it's so small!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I reuse several of my sturdier water bottles that come with the snap top caps, but I have to hand wash them because they melt in the dishwasher. This brush is perfect for cleaning down to the very bottom with little effort. Couldn’t be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Huskygrl

customer_reviews.title: A must have for narrow neck water bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! The shaft is strong with a metal core. It's skinny enough to get into my narrow mouth bottles, but tough enough to actually get them clean. I've been switching over to mostly silicon cleaning and kitchen tools and this one does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Brannan

customer_reviews.title: Needs cleaning solution for glass
customer_reviews.text: The downside of silicone is that if you are planning on using it to clean resin from your "glassware", it will not rub off as easy as a wire brush because the resin wont adhere to the brush and the resin will just start smudging, and thus still requires some sort of cleaning solution. On the bright side, the bristles are incredibly easy to clean with just hot running water, and the large size is a huge plus for "long necked" glass. Overall a good brush, but not a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this colorful brush! The silicone is durable and flexible making cleaning a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Bottle cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Tried clean SS portable water bottle. It’s lot easier to use sponge ball on stick you can buy from local store. Size of brush does not adjust to in side demension like sponge.
customer_reviews.author: oneputt

customer_reviews.title: It probably cleans fine...
customer_reviews.text: This bottle brush is nice and long, but the brush head is quite small. Good if you are looking for a brush for your bottle with a small mouth piece, but it's a bit more work to use. I bought the silicone one because it's more hygienic than a brush with bristles, but it doesn't create lots of suds like a sponge or typical brush would.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Buy at own risk
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice upon receiving and thanks to Amazon’s amazing return services I will be returning it tomorrow. Terrible canteen brush, I can see people using this for baby bottles but anything else it’s very ineffective. Doesn’t sud up. Don’t know where all the positive reviews came from. Would not recommend this to anyone who clean canteens or mason glass jars
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Shorter Than Necessary, But Able to Fix That
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize 12 1/2 inches was too short to get to the bottom of a 64 oz hydro. Ended up mcgyvering a carbon tube extension to the metal interior shaft to about 18 inches (sorry, no photo) but works great now, even on shorter bottles. Doesn't seem to scratch like those twisted metal bristle thingies. Great that is has a hole at the end of the handle for hanging, promotes drying, less bacteria. Can't really judge durability yet but seems the silicone bristles will last a good long while. Like the fun color, easy to ID.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little brush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my greenhouse for washing up measuring cups that i use for garden chemicals. It is easy to clean, retains its shape, unlike bristles on a brush. Dries quickly and always ready for use. Garden chemicals don't hurt it, so i would guess nothing you would find in a kitchen sink would damage it either.
customer_reviews.author: bert

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY bottle brush!
customer_reviews.text: Quality Bottle Brush Cleaning my skinny vases before was so time consuming as I had to use a spatula with a paper towel to get to the dried bits on the side, but I was never able to get them totally clean. Now with this sturdy bottle brush, it’s made that tedious job very easy and I don’t have to worry about getting the vases scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Dj Shirley

customer_reviews.title: disappointed...WAY to small
customer_reviews.text: as you can see, this thing is VERY small. i was expecting it to be the same size as standard bottle brush. well, that's not the case, and i didn't pay attention to the reviews. seems well made though. going to keep it, may find it useful sometime. bottom line ALWAYS read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Does what I couldn't, get to the bottom of it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing the dishes for 7 years now. My dish elf found another elf. Long story short, I FINALLY, broke down and now can literally get to the bottom of the glasses and drink bottles. Cleaning, just put in the dishwasher. Little drop dish soap and water, couple of swishes and D U N N Dunn. (Small town between Lawrenceburg and Leoma, TN) Done!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Brush is very ergonomic, feels comfortable in my hand. Finally have something that really cleans my large thermos. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kitchen accessory!!
customer_reviews.text: What did I like? That’s easy; the steadfast loyalty, unwavering dedication to cleanliness, the absence of mold in my water bottle cap. My boyfriend doesn’t recognize me anymore-I actually willingly clean my wine glasses with this brush instead of forcefully shoving my entire fist to the bottom of the glass whilst clinging onto a wet paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: SCrow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love that both ends are used for different size cleaners . Most in stores only have one cleaning head. I've had no issues and it cleans my water bottles perfectly
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Love its dishwasher safe and doesn't get food particles stuck or develop a smell.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like how the brush is easy to clean but I feel like there is no way to actually lather the dish soap with this bottle cleaner. For this reason alone I am not satisfied with this brush. I got it to clean my hydro flask but I feel like it does not clean it well because even though it’s made of silicone it doesn’t lather to where you can actually clean the bottle well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Its great for like baby bottles, but not so perfect for bigger bottles. It works to clean okay, but not amazing for scrubbing hard to clean issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn and Ed

customer_reviews.title: clesns off so ,so,  well any product residue.Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I give this product *****stars,thats 5 stars. This product cleans very well no matter what you wash out with it. If anything clings on brush oily or not. So in my opinion(not tested) this silicone product is bacteria free! Oh cleans in dish washer too! Love this product
customer_reviews.author: shirley seaquist

customer_reviews.title: Not a scrubber
customer_reviews.text: thought this would be an appropriate product, since all my standard bottle brushes wear out rather quickly. It is sturdy and doesnt get gross. The caveat, it just doesnt feel like it scrubs well. The nubs on it are so short and stiff, it barely makes contact with your vessel. I'd rather go through numerous bristle brushes that get the job done than waste my time trying to get something clean forever. Maybe there's a specific use for it that im missing?
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Slafter

customer_reviews.title: Won't go into a small neck bittke.
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a collection of brushes that I use to clean my humminbbird feeders. There are some that no brush will reach and this brush is one that would not reach some places. I just keep buying brushes and feeder and hoping some day I will come up with a god combination,.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Durable, extra long handle is convenient
customer_reviews.text: We use quart sized canning jars a lot, the wide mouth jars can be difficult to clean by hand so we got this. It makes getting food stuck at the bottom of the jars a breeze, and hold up far better than the cheap plastic bristle bottle cleaners you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for something like this for my daughter’s hand wash only water bottles for a long time. I love how this can be cleaned in the dishwasher so I don’t have to worry about mold or bacteria in a sponge. It cleans my daughter’s water bottles quickly and easily! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin O.

customer_reviews.title: My water bottle is now clean
customer_reviews.text: My water bottle is coke bottle shaped. This brush is flexible and small. I have a net dish washing cloth that I put in first then use the brush to wash the bottom of the bottle.with the net still in there to scrub not only the bottom but the sides. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wence

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied with this product as a bottle brush. It is too hard to blend around and the brush head is too hard as well. It does not easily to create bubbles and to clear small cracks or holes. The head size is a lot smaller than I expected - I was expect to have about the normal bottle size, not this small.
customer_reviews.author: jolin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The brush seems to work well. The brush head is much smaller than expected. I guess that makes it easier to get it into smaller bottles but it also takes some extra effort to reach all the surfaces for cleaning. In all honesty, if I knew how small the brush head was I probably would have looked elsewhere. It'll serve its purpose for now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bottle brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bottle brush for bottles with smaller openings. Bristle brushes typically cannot reach all areas of bottles and vases, but this brush has no such limitations. It is also easy to clean and dries instantly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: cmharper

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Kindness of a weird issue. The handle is soft (as in no support in the handle). The brush is sturdy, the bristles are sturdy. The handle flesh. So when your trying to swirl it to the bottom corners of the bottle the handle flexes in a weird kind of way.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good for soda stream bottles and small containers
customer_reviews.text: Just received and tested out. Seems good. I needed something to clean my soda stream bottles and this brush head is the perfect size and the length is good too. Also works for some small dressing containers and measuring cups. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle brush. It's much better than the conventional one. It gets the bottoms of all bottles and fits into any size jar or bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Barb M. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the bottle brush/cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the bottle brush/cleaner which I purchased from you. It is a perfect size and rigidity to get the inside of the bottles clean in my vintage bottle collection. It also works well on reusable coffee and water bottles which I take with me when I drive or walk. I look forward to ordering additional items from you soon. Sincerely, Laura
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a brush that I could use with my slim glasses as well as regular sized ones and this is perfect. It is versatile enough that I can now get rid of the others I purchased when a search of a brush to use with while washing my glasses and water bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase! I will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the sturdy and firm-grip handle. This size is long enough to reach the bottom on my biggest thermos. I’m happy with this purchase. The only test is how long before the bristles are worn away. I love the idea of a sanitized reusable bottle brush.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Have been having trouble for years with being able to clean out sports bottles; this bottle brush is awesome and does exactly what I need it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Basham

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard to reach areas
customer_reviews.text: Good for glass mason jars and deep stainless steel water bottle. I’ve found that you will want to make sure that the tip is sudsy before washing for best results.
customer_reviews.author: FoxBeeCo

customer_reviews.title: NEED BETTER DESCRIPTION OF THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Sadly they didnt do what I was hoping for! I blame it on the product description...( vague) these plastic "cleaners" are very ridiged, shorter than I imagined, my bad... Wished the discription would had been much more descriptive and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush for cleaning my tall drinking cups, i.e. Takeya, Yeti and Hydroflasks. they have cleaned the cups very well and I feel better using the silicon than a sponge or bristley brush! I feel very comfortable recommending this brush to others!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush for the water bottles, but have been using it to clean the coffee carafe because it does not have a hard plastic or bamboo handle that causes me to have to replace the carafe when I crack it because I'm not careful...sigh. The brush is long and slender and doesn't hog a bunch of space with the benefit of being more sanitary than the normal bristles. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Browning

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I got this as I was going through lots of bottle brushes. I personally don't really care for it. It doesn't hold soap well. Its very long (if youre using for short bottles) and not really "plush" I don't feel like the rubber brush is long enough
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Knoff

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush because when I used my bristle brush, and pulled it out of the bottle, water would get on me. The silicone brush doesn't do that and it cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Jo Gilstorf

product_meta.title: Kitchiny Silicone Bottle Brush | One Brush | 12.5” Bottle Cleaner for your Hydro Flask, Vacuum Sports Bottle, Vase and Glassware | Water Bottle Cleaning Brush for Washing Narrow Neck Containers
product_meta.description:
Kitchiny’s Bottle Brush is the perfect blend of functionality and quality you’ll ever need to clean those pesky, narrow containers your hand cannot reach into

The brush head will NOT fit in a beer, wine or kombucha bottle neck size, so use the grooved handle instead!

Package Content: 1

Total Length: 12.5 inches

Brush Head: 1.8” Length x 1.3” Width



🔶 Save money by using our durable, long bottle cleaning brush, and ditch those germ-ridden, smelly sponges that need frequent replacing

🔶 Non-scratching bristles of our bottle cleaner always leave your delicate glassware, vases, and baby bottles completely scratch-free

🔶 Flexible bristles of our water bottle brush will keep their shape, and won’t disintegrate even with heavy-duty scrubbing

🔶 The ergonomic, ribbed handle of the Kitchiny bottle brush cleaner ensures a secure grip with soapy hands, and can be used for cleaning too

🔶 Unlike sponges, our silicone bottle brush will not absorb grease or unpleasant odors, and comes with a handy hanging hook for drying or storage

🔶 Our 12.5” long bottle brushes are BPA free, dishwasher safe, and heat resistant up to 450°F (230°C)

🔶 QUICK TIP! As silicone is non-absorbent, our bottle brush works best when water and soap is added to your container first, then scrub!

Add the Kitchiny Silicone Bottle Cleaning Brush to your cart NOW!
feature_bullets: 🔶 CLEAN TRICKY-TO-REACH PLACES: With its long reach handle and soft, flexible bristles, Kitchiny’s bottle brush gets deep down into nooks and crannies to easily scrub away stubborn grime in tall, narrow containers. As the brush head will NOT fit in beer/wine/kombucha bottles, use the ribbed handle instead!

🔶 BETTER HYGIENE FOR YOU: Our antibacterial silicone water bottle brush repels unpleasant odors, grease and stains, preventing nasty germ build-up which is more hygienic and healthier for your family. It’s finally time to toss away that smelly sponge!

🔶 SAY GOODBYE TO GRUNGY CONTAINERS: Our bottle brushes are perfect to swish out your slimy hydro flask, scrub dregs from your thermos, or blitz residue in your shaker and baby bottles. Silicone does not hold soap, so just add warm, soapy water to your container first, and start scrubbing away!

🔶 NO MORE SCRATCHES: The supple, silicone bristles of our bottle brush cleaner are tough on gunk, yet gentle enough to leave your favorite vase, glass water bottle, pitcher, and delicate glassware all scratch-free. Even the grooved handle is usable for scratchless cleaning!

🔶 LONG LASTING & DURABLE: The bristles of the rugged Kitchiny brush for bottles always keep their shape, and will never smoosh, break off or fall apart. Our stylish kitchen gadget is BPA free, dishwasher safe and heat-resistant up to 450°F (230°C). Order yours today!
